path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Stay In Destiny World Token and TimeLockWallet - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Meaningless Locking
findings.description: Locking mechanism in TimeLockedWallet.sol is unnecessary and does not provide any security benefits.

findings.title: Treasury Pool Contract Logic Vulnerability
findings.description: Since we do not control the logic of the treasuryPool, there is no guarantee that owner can not withdraw tokens from the pool after destroyBlackMoney from users(hackers) wallet and refundBlackMoney to the pool.
